TEI.2.document_title: Samuel M Williams to Stephen F Austin, 06-09-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel M. Williams to Austin, June 9, 1829. Shipping in Galveston Bay. Doctor Woodbury wants Austin's opinion about security of slaves in Texas. He says that Poinsett is interested in Zavala's contract to settle families in east Texas.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes:
John Lucius Woodbury was granted a contract to settle 200 families, Nov. 14, 1826, and John Cameron, on May 21, 1827, received a contract to settle 100 families in Texas Decree No. 46 of the legislature of Coahuila and Texas, on Feb. 25, 1828, granted Woodbury and Cameion for 23 yeais the exclusive privilege to exploit iron and coal mines in the State.
Commodore David Porter. See his letter to Austin, April 10, 1829
Zavala's contract to settle 500 families in East Texas was granted Mar. 12, 1829. Zavala, Joseph Vehlein, and David G. Burnet later pooled their grants and formed with certain financiers in New York and Boston the Galveston Bay and Texas Land Co.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel M. Williams to Austin, June 9, 1829. Shipping in Galveston Bay. Doctor Woodbury wants Austin's opinion about security of slaves in Texas. He says that Poinsett is interested in Zavala's contract to settle families in east Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*At *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr Scott*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-09-1829">June 9th 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My Dear Sir*/p*
*p*After much fatigue and some bruising the Eclipse has arrived safely at *location_mentioned*Rightors point bar*/location_mentioned*. We got into *location_mentioned*Galveston Bay*/location_mentioned* on *date_mentioned n="06-03-1829">Wednesday*/date_mentioned*—Came into the *location_mentioned*Bay */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*by the S. W. Channel*/location_mentioned*—beat in and found it a good passage 11 feet shoalest Cast—I think it first rate for all vessels not over 9 feet draft of water.—We touched slightly on two *location_mentioned*bars */location_mentioned*but got off without difficulty—beat up to *location_mentioned*Redfish bar*/location_mentioned* on *date_mentioned n="06-04-1829">Thursday morning*/date_mentioned*—good *location_mentioned*Channel */location_mentioned*about 10 feet—from Thursday to *date_mentioned n="06-07-1829">Sunday evening*/date_mentioned* We were watching the bar *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*and myself sounded it all over—We found it staked out but as the water was low hoped to find a *location_mentioned*deeper place*/location_mentioned* however We were disappointed—and on Sunday night and *date_mentioned n="06-08-1829">monday morning*/date_mentioned* pressed and worried her over in 41/2 feet water she drawing 5 1/2. twont do except at full, and change tides, except for vessels of an easy draft. About the same water at *location_mentioned*Righters point bar*/location_mentioned*,—*person_mentioned*Harris */person_mentioned*has gone up to *location_mentioned*Harrisburg */location_mentioned*and I expect the Eclipse will be discharged at the *location_mentioned*point*/location_mentioned*—The freight for her was sent on in the Alert and the Eclipse will have to go in without freight—While we were lying at the *location_mentioned*bar */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Doctors Woodbury*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Cameron*/person_mentioned* Came on *location_mentioned*board */location_mentioned*us I had some conversation with the former, he expressed much anxiety to receive a letter from you—he told me he had received the sanction of the *person_mentioned*Superioridad */person_mentioned*for the 10 *location_mentioned*litorales */location_mentioned*adjoining you *location_mentioned*Eastwardly */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*extending six leagues in the limitrofe*/location_mentioned*—Our friend *person_mentioned*hatchet */person_mentioned*faced *person_mentioned*Davy */person_mentioned*is too late—further he said this, a branch in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*he expected to interest a very wealthy House in *location_mentioned*Phila*/location_mentioned*. and flatters himself with doing much for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—said much about the*location_mentioned* Hacienda Nacional*/location_mentioned*, no money—no prospect except from *location_mentioned*Gran Bretaña*/location_mentioned*, for which he thinks the *location_mentioned*southern territory*/location_mentioned* will go—he says we shall soon be left to take care of ourselves—he expressed very much anxiety to have your letter Contain, a sentence respecting the *person_mentioned*Nagurs */person_mentioned*about the security for introduction etc. had understood at*location_mentioned* S. f. de A*/location_mentioned* and at other places on the road this side of *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, that they could be introduced, and would be secure—this opinion Came from you—he asked me many questions on the subject and said on account of yr known standing etc much weight would be given to any thing U—said on the subject and wished you to be full on that point, alth° he did not wish you to enter into Compromisos— I enclose you his note,—*person_mentioned*Cameron */person_mentioned*also wished to hear from you—*/p*
*p*I expect *person_mentioned*Mr, Scott*/person_mentioned* will go over about the *date_mentioned n="07-01-1829">first of next month*/date_mentioned* to bring *person_mentioned*Sarah */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*over here, and as it is probable that *person_mentioned*Gorge */person_mentioned*may be anxious to come likewise, and that you may not wish to use all the time about Town I wish you to get *person_mentioned*Mr. Ingram*/person_mentioned* to stay there, and give *person_mentioned*Aunt mary*/person_mentioned* instructions how to track.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Woodbury */person_mentioned*informed me that *person_mentioned*Poinsett */person_mentioned*was interested in the Contract which had been made by the *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*Zavala*/person_mentioned*, I also in one on the *location_mentioned*Guazacoaleo */location_mentioned*and Complained much of having been interfered with by *person_mentioned*Poinsett */person_mentioned*in his Contracts with the Govt particularly in the Contract for the *person_mentioned*litorales */person_mentioned*in front of his *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*— I presume that *person_mentioned*Poinsett */person_mentioned*has been speculating in his official capacity to his individual benifit.*/p*
*p*I hope we will be off in a day or two, and am as ever yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S M Williams */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*S F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[On margin:] Please write to *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*and request him to send up my saddle by some safe oppy.*/p*
*person_mentioned*S. M. W.*/person_mentioned*
